text: It appears if you try to upload a moduleâ€™s html file and the hubl in it is invalid(in my case an unclosed if statement) it wipes out the html+HubL part of the module.
I would rather it do what the Fields file does for that situation; fail to overwrite the file

if more descript error messages are not possible through FTP clients themselves. it would be really nice to have a web interface that would just act like a console, and would auto update with FTP error messages related to you as a user or to anyone using FTP but would be filterable by user
